steps.section: Prepare individual amino acid stock solutions
Prepare amino acid mix solution (∼17 nM each)

steps.data:
{"blocks":[{"key":"cp0mh","text":"    Prepare the following stock solutions:
  
 
 
 
 ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"blvfi","text":"  1M DTT: Put 2.31 g DTT in a 15 ml Falcon tube and fill with water to 15 ml. Sterilize using a 0.22 μM filter. Aliquot in 1.5 ml Eppendorf tubes. Store at -20 °C for later use.
2M HEPES pH 8:  Weight 19.1 g HEPES (MW 238.21). Dissolve with 30ml water. Adjust pH to 8.0 with KOH. Fill with water to 40 ml.
 5 mg/ml tRNA solution: Put 30 mg of tRNA in a 1.5 ml Eppendorf tube. Fill with water to 600 μl.
 CoA stock solution: Put 30 mg of CoA (MW 767.53) in a 1.5 ml Eppendorf tube and fill with water to 600 μl.
 38.3 mM NAD solution: Put 34.83 mg of NAD (MW 663.43) in a 1.5 ml Eppendorf tube, add 27 μl of Tris at 2 M (to bring the solution to pH 8.0). Finally, fill with water to 300 μl.
 23 mM cAMP solution: Put 42.80 mg of cAMP (MW 329.22) in a 1.5 ml Eppendorf tube, add 73 μl of Tris at 2 M (to bring the solution to pH 8.0). Finally, fill with water to 200 μl. 
 40 mM Folinic acid solution: To 20 mg of solid folinic acid calcium salt (MW 511.5), add 1.15 ml of water. 
 Spermidine stock solution: Briefly warm spermidine ( two minutes at 37°C) in order to melt it. Then, put 23.55 μl of spermidine (MW 145.25) into a 1.5 Eppendorf tube and fill with water to 150 μl.
 240 mg/ml maltodextrin solution: Put 2.4 g of maltodextrin in a 15 ml Falcon tube. Dissolve, and fill with water to 10 ml. 
 Nucleotide Mix solution: Put 145 mg of ATP dipotassium salt dihydrate (MW 619.4), 133 mg of GTP disodium salt dihydrate (MW 567.14), 79.4 mg of CTP disodium salt dihydrate (MW 563.16), 82.6 mg of UTP trisodium salt dihydrate (MW 586.12) in a 1.5 Eppendorf tube. Add 353 μl of KOH (15 w/v %) .Finally, fill with water to 1.5 ml.

Aliquots can be stored at -80\u00b0C","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[],"guid":"D2F8C825DA174F8D9D64CEA5FE121D37","id":674829,"previous_id":674826,"previous_guid":"3DFCB9819A0C4143AC91D6D030B51A52","section":"Prepare amino acid mix solution (\u223c17 nM each)"}
steps.section: Prepare amino acid mix solution (∼14 mM each)

steps.data: {"blocks":[{"key":"eqjo5","text":"Dissolve well the maltodextrin-based energy solution using vortex. \u00a0Aliquot\u00a0in 2 ml Eppendorf\u00a0tubes and store at -80\u00b0C prior to use.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[],"guid":"5F38FD6C83FC4D10808F6A59DC619C38","id":674830,"previous_id":674828,"previous_guid":"F0D837CB7CFC494FA05CE3A3F6B02782","section":"Prepare maltodextrin-based energy solution "}

{"blocks":[{"key":"e3pf9","text":"Weight 0.15 g of sodium hexametaphosphate and put it into a 15 ml Falcon tube. Dissolve well and fill with water to 5 ml. Put the solution in a boiling water bath for 5 minutes. Kepp in the solution in the lab bench until it reaches room temperature. Aliquot in 1.5 ml Eppendorf tubes and keep at -80\u00b0C before use.\u00a0","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"4ckgi","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"offset":0,"length":1,"key":0}],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[{"type":"reagents","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"id":4617,"guid":"","linfor":null,"mol_weight":0,"name":"sodium hexametaphosphate","_public":"","reagent_vendor_link":"http:\/\/sigmaaldrich.com","sku":"305553","url":"","vendor":{"name":"Sigma Aldrich","affiliation":null,"username":null,"link":"http:\/\/sigmaaldrich.com","image":{"source":"https:\/\/www.protocols.io\/img\/vendors\/placeholder.png","placeholder":"https:\/\/www.protocols.io\/img\/vendors\/placeholder.png"},"badges":[],"id":17},"public":0,"can_edit":0}}],"guid":"AE8E4E00C7324B44B154F1B26EF74F16","id":674831,"previous_id":674830,"previous_guid":"5F38FD6C83FC4D10808F6A59DC619C38","section":"Prepare hexametaphophate solution"}
